Package com.brycethuilot.auto_mailer

Class NarragansettBay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brycethuilot.auto_mailer.Policy
      • com.brycethuilot.auto_mailer.NarragansettBay
  • public class NarragansettBay
extends Policy
    NarragansettBay is a subclass of Policy. It can support PDF's created by Narragansett Bay Insurance Company in HO3 format
    Since:
    1.0
